Description: *****Scroll down to see 45 HD images of this guitar***** Here's an early 1991 Gibson Les Paul Classic Plus 1960 RI in a factory original Cherry Red Flametop. It's a superb example of an early LP Classic - kind of a pre-cursor to the Historic line. This guitar is in very nice condition with light playwear. The is pretty clean and glossy with a few light marks. The back has some squiggle lines and a few indents. All the electronics work perfectly. The neck is straight and the frets are in very good condition. The pickups are the original Gibson humbuckers. The pots are all original and date to the 25th week of 1991. It has just been detailed. The front, back, sides and neck were waxed and buffed with a high grade carnuba wax. The frets were polished and the fingerboard was cleaned, buffed and moisturized with an instrument grade lemon oil. It was set up with 10/46's, adjusted and plays very nicely. She has a slim 60's neck profile and weighs 8.9 lbs.. Comes with the original Gibson hardshell case as seen in the pictures. This guitar will be safely packed and shipped. Buyer to pay $60 FedEx shipping anywhere in the U.S. Full insurance included in shipping. California residents please add 7.25% sales tax. Local San Diego pickup always welcome. Will ship worldwide. International shipping guidelines: Buyer is responsible for any import duties. We can declare a low value. FedEx Ground to Canada is $175 with full insurance. FedEx or USPS Express is $245 to most parts of Europe and the UK. FedEx is $295 to Asia and Australia. Full insurance available. Please call or email me if you have any questions - 858-531-2287
